entity.description: Former US President John F. Kennedy

text: @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus is the most momentous historical event during my lifetime--and I lived through JFK, MLK, RFK, Vietnam, Watergate & 9/11. We will experience economic depression and/or hundreds of thousands of more deaths. In U.S., local officials will make calls. Sit this out, Trump.
